text: Bought a dog toy, my cavapoo (3.5kg) chewed and broke the hardened ball on the same day. Not sure if she had swallowed any residual. Raised QC concern to PLC, response pointed to no toy is indestructible and supervision is needed. I agree with the explanation but I am of the view that this cannot be the case when it is a small dog having the toy for less than probably 15 minutes. Caution if you want to buy the same type of toy; I will refrain myself from buying from PLC. One star is minimal and probably deserving given PLC responded within next working day.

I decided to take a visit to this humble abode. While shopping for some Pussie Cat Fresh Mackerel, a very attentive trainee approached me to assist me in my shopping. This truly made my experience here very comfortable. To the trainee who works on tuesdays at around 2pm, thank you so much! I also appreciate the Burp! Dogs love burp! Duck Coin Bak Kwa (Duck Jerky) Food you recommended me. My animals will certainly enjoy these delicacies!

If I have a choice to rate the digital payment system and the online shopping experience for loyal customers of pet lover, I would not have given any stars at all.

Management of pet lover please do something about your payment system and upgrade membership portal for ease of payment.

Your retail staff saved the day. Lim Au Nan and Jasmine and Elena were patiently handling the many customers flow, cleaning up the place and helping me with a warehouse order bec the shop didn‚Äôt carry the variety of pet food that I wanted. The login to your membership app was a disaster.  Please do something about it.

Your three staff needs special mention bec they were patient, friendly and calm under pressure. In fact many of your staff in the BBC various outlets have displayed exemplary customer service. Keep up the good work and please reward them. Thank you.

A trainee staff was very patient with my requests on dog food and which dog toys were on discount and I was able to get the things I needed fast and efficiently and had a pretty good experience due to the friendly lady
(P.s. thank you jasmine)

Visited this store for the second time.
I really like the service of the staff here, she still remembers what I bought last time.Very helpful solve what I need. Attentive and passionate.‚ù§Ô∏è Really greatÔºÅÔºÅI just bought the natural dog treats she introduced to my babyÔºåand some Christmas sales.
They always have a friendly smile and help each other to make customers have a good knowledge of shopping experience.
